availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Raphael "Ralph" Carter Hagan (Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. Nelson County native. Son of Basil Hagan and [Unknown] Carter Hagan. Married to Sarah Ann Lilly Hagan in Nelson County on October 31, 1852. Father of John Hagan. Married to Mary L. Hagan. Father of Joseph Hagan, Mary L. Hagan, and Charles Hagan. Farmer in Nelson County in 1860. Farmer in Nelson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 254.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, Precinct 10, p. 139A.

Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Nelson County, KY, 1863, p. 199, p. 216 of 317 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
